name: FSkinWeightProfileInfo
doc: Structure storing user facing properties, and is used to identify profiles at the SkeletalMesh level

Name: FName
Name of the Skin Weight Profile
DefaultProfile: Whether or not this Profile should be considered the Default loaded for specific LODs rather than the original Skin Weights of the Skeletal Mesh
DefaultProfileFromLODIndex: When DefaultProfile is set any LOD below this LOD Index will override the Skin Weights of the Skeletal Mesh with the Skin Weights from this Profile
